channel.title: Etymology on stultus notes
channel.description: Recent content in Etymology on stultus notes

item.title: Jerry Rigging
item.description: A blend of ‘jury-rigged’ and ‘jerry-built’ meaning to make a makeshift repair or construct something quickly using only materials at hand.

item.title: Kludge
item.description: A workaround or makeshift solution that is clumsy, inelegant, and hard to maintain, but rapidly solves an important problem using available resources.

item.title: Podcast Etymology
item.description: The word ‘podcast’ was coined by Ben Hammersley in February 2004 as a blend of ‘iPod’ and ‘broadcast’.
